Calculate manure management emissions with Tier 1 and Tier 2 options

Source: R/calc_emissions_manure.R
calc_emissions_manure.Rd

Estimates CH4 and N2O emissions from manure management using IPCC Tier 1 or Tier 2 methodology with IDF-specific factors.

calc_emissions_manure(
  n_cows,
  manure_system = "pasture",
  tier = 1,
  ef_ch4 = NULL,
  n_excreted = 100,
  ef_n2o_direct = 0.02,
  include_indirect = FALSE,
  climate = "temperate",
  avg_body_weight = 600,
  diet_digestibility = 0.65,
  protein_intake_kg = NULL,
  retention_days = NULL,
  system_temperature = NULL,
  gwp_ch4 = 27.2,
  gwp_n2o = 273,
  boundaries = NULL
)

Arguments

n_cows

Numeric. Number of dairy cows.

manure_system

Character. Type of manure management system. Options: "pasture", "solid_storage", "liquid_storage", "anaerobic_digester". Default = "pasture".

tier

Numeric. IPCC methodology tier (1 or 2). Default = 1.

ef_ch4

Numeric. Emission factor for CH4 (kg CH4 per cow per year). If NULL, uses system-specific defaults. Only used for Tier 1.

n_excreted

Numeric. Nitrogen excreted per cow per year (kg N). Default = 100. For Tier 2, calculated from diet data if available.

ef_n2o_direct

Numeric. Emission factor for direct N2O-N (kg N2O-N/kg N excreted). Default = 0.02 (IPCC 2019 refinement).

include_indirect

Logical. Include indirect N2O emissions from volatilization and leaching? Default = FALSE.

climate

Character. Climate region for Tier 2. Options: "cold", "temperate", "warm". Default = "temperate".

avg_body_weight

Numeric. Average live weight (kg). Default = 600. Required for Tier 2.

diet_digestibility

Numeric. Apparent digestibility of diet (0-1). Default = 0.65. Required for Tier 2.

protein_intake_kg

Numeric. Daily protein intake (kg/day). Used for refined N2O calculation in Tier 2.

retention_days

Numeric. Days manure stays in system. Default varies by system. Used in Tier 2.

system_temperature

Numeric. Average temperature of manure system (°C). Used in Tier 2.

gwp_ch4

Numeric. Global Warming Potential of CH4. Default = 27.2 (IPCC AR6).

gwp_n2o

Numeric. Global Warming Potential of N2O. Default = 273 (IPCC AR6).

boundaries

Optional. An object from set_system_boundaries().

Value

A list with CH4 (kg), N2O (kg), CO2eq (kg), and detailed metadata.
